comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "The Sunshine State Parkway takes a gentle curve at the West Palm Beach Interchange area. Photo shows both lanes of the Turnpike ready for surfacing. In the background work is progressing on the bridge which will carry the traffic of State Road 704 (Okeechobee Boulevard) over the Turnpike."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
